numbered_ace_sentences: 1. In each sport, the ratio of players of color is larger than the percentage of coaches of color.
2. In the NFL, the gap is 61%.
3. In the MLS, the gap is 19%.
4. The MLS has the largest percentage of head coaches of color.
5. I wonder if other leagues have similar numbers.
6. I especially wonder if European leagues have similar numbers.
7. Young people can look up to many athletes in different sports.
8. Athletes do not have many coaches of similar background.
9. A coach of similar background can understand an athlete.
11. The headline is: You can become a professional player but not a head coach based on your skin color.
